name: Release 8.2.0.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for 8.2.0.1 by @buildifier-prebuilt-releases in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/119
* Mark extension as reproducible by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/120


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/compare/8.2.0.1...8.2.0.2

## Bazel Module Snippet

```python
bazel_dep(
    name = "buildifier_prebuilt",
    version = "8.2.0.2",
    dev_dependency = True,
)
```

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "buildifier_prebuilt",
    sha256 = "f98dd3d8f32661629b8cab11f02d7730bb8e03bd8af09dbbb268047889c8ff10",
    strip_prefix = "buildifier-prebuilt-8.2.0.2",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/archive/8.2.0.2.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:deps.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_deps")

buildifier_prebuilt_deps()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:defs.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains")

buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains()
```

name: Release 8.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for 8.0.3 by @buildifier-prebuilt-releases in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/112
* Add `exec_compatible_with = HOST_CONSTRAINTS` to rules by @brentleyjones in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/113
* Fix add_tables as run file target to buildifier by @tjoneslo in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/115
* Update to 8.2.0 by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/116

## New Contributors
* @brentleyjones made their first contribution in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/113
* @tjoneslo made their first contribution in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/115

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/compare/8.0.3...8.2.0

```python
    dev_dependency = True,
```

```python
    urls = [
```


name: Release 6.1.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for 6.0.0.1 by @buildifier-prebuilt-releases in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/55
* Update bcr_test_module test matrix by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/56
* Fix bcr test path by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/57
* Update bcr test targets by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/58
* Allow buildifier_test to escape the sandbox by @erikkerber in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/59
* Use https:// everywhere by @fmeum in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/60
* chore: update rules_bazel_integration_test to latest version by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/61
* Update to 6.1.0 by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/62
* chore: enable bzlmod by default for root workspace by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/64
* Simplify generate script by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/63

## New Contributors
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/60

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/compare/6.0.0.1...6.1.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python

    name = "buildifier_prebuilt",
    sha256 = "e46c16180bc49487bfd0f1ffa7345364718c57334fa0b5b67cb5f27eba10f309",
    strip_prefix = "buildifier-prebuilt-6.1.0",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/archive/6.1.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:deps.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_deps")

buildifier_prebuilt_deps()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:defs.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains")

buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains()
```

* Find all *.bazel files for fixing by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/52
* Add strip_prefix by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/53
* Update presubmit for test module by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/54


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/compare/6.0.0...6.0.0.1

```python
bazel_skylib_workspace()

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:defs.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains")

buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains()
```

name: Release 0.4.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README.md for 0.4.0 by @buildifier-prebuilt-releases in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/29
* Upgraded `rules_bazel_integration_test` to use `bazel-contrib` release. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/30
* Remove joining CI job by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/31
* add support for -diff_command by @jmelahman in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/33
* Add test_env=PATH for finding gh/jq by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/34

## New Contributors
* @jmelahman made their first contribution in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/33

name: Release 0.4.0

* Update README.md for 0.3.2 by @buildifier-prebuilt-releases in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/25
* Disable Xcode toolchains to avoid CI flakiness by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/26
* Add support for specifying raw category warnings along with those with modifiers. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/28

name: Release 0.2.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Update README by @keith in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/3
* Added missing dependencies and added example with integration test. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/6
* Add the ability to specify the version and tool from `buildtools`. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/7
* Generate canonical assets declaration by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/10
* Added daily CI builds and a badge referencing their results. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/13
* Implement release GitHub Actions workflow by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/12
* Added release `README.md`, moved bazel-starlib download, and bumped bazel-starlib version. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/14
* Upgraded bazel-starlib to 0.4.1. by @cgrindel in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/16

## New Contributors
* @cgrindel made their first contribution in https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/pull/6

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/compare/0.1.3...0.2.0

## Workspace Snippet

```python
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "buildifier_prebuilt",
    sha256 = "49b7edf3490c13eae5b4b8aa98ed051fdd4f1b8dd60276d818e4f559614bf083",
    strip_prefix = "buildifier-prebuilt-0.2.0",
    urls = [
        "http://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/archive/0.2.0.tar.gz",
    ],
)

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:deps.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_deps")

buildifier_prebuilt_deps()

load("@bazel_skylib//:workspace.bzl", "bazel_skylib_workspace")

bazel_skylib_workspace()

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:defs.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains")

buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains()
```

`WORKSPACE` setup:

```bzl
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "buildifier_prebuilt",
    sha256 = "5a4568c981ddaa9c4d3a8ccd1f6c07dfb534cfdbde953778cef35c22cf1cd2a6",
    strip_prefix = "buildifier-prebuilt-0.1.3",
    url = "https://github.com/keith/buildifier-prebuilt/archive/refs/tags/0.1.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@buildifier_prebuilt//:defs.bzl", "buildifier_prebuilt_deps", "buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains")

buildifier_prebuilt_deps()

buildifier_prebuilt_register_toolchains()
```

name: Initial release
body: This is at least partially working now
